name: DiceRoller
description:
Dice Roller simulates the throwing of one or two dice. Use it when your game's dice are missing or simply as an alternative to traditional dice.

Dice Roller runs on Apple WatchOS 3 as well as iPhone and iPad. When running on Watch it does not need to be connected to iPhone.

The dice roll when the main screen is tapped. The die or dice rotate and then stop, displaying a random result between 1 and 6 on the top face of each die. The app also optionally plays the sound of one or two dice rolling, as appropriate.

The total of the dice is optionally spoken in English (Watch, iPhone and iPad), and French, German, Chinese or Spanish (iPhone and iPad) depending on the device's International setting. This feature is surprisingly useful.

The total of the previous roll is displayed at the bottom left of the screen.

The number of dice and the optional features - including background colour on iPhone or iPad - are selected on the info screen - swipe right to left on Watch. The default is two dice, sounds on for iPhone, iPad and Watch. The app uses the Watch's speaker.

Compatible with iOS8, iOS9, iOS10 and iOS11, WatchOS 3+.
